# Midnight

A darkmode theme created for testing purposes.

  <article>

## Use `midnight` as your theme

1. Go to `faststore.config.js` and change the `theme` to your file's name:

```js
// Theming
theme: 'midnight',
```

2. Add the [Raleway](https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Raleway?query=raleway) font on `src/fonts/WebFonts.tsx`:

```tsx
function WebFonts() {
  return (
    <link
      rel="stylesheet"
      href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Raleway:wght@300;400;700;900&display=swap"
    />
  )
}
```

3. Restart the server.

  </article>
</section>
